sent.orig: "Too" was a slip of the pen; I meant to write" to"
To respond to this, you can reply: Good to see you too.
sent.trans: 对此，你可以这样对答：Goodtoseeyou,too（我也很高兴再次见到你）。

sent.orig: Because there is too much civilisation, too means of subsistence, too much industry, too much commerce.
sent.trans: 因为社会上文明过度，生活资料太多，工业和商业太发达。

sent.orig: It's too hot today! Too hot for shopping, too hot for walking, too hot for sightseeing.
sent.trans: 今天真是太热了！热得没法逛商店，或者出去走走，或者去观光游览。

sent.orig: Faults: Muzzle either too snipy or too coarse; muzzle too short or too long.
sent.trans: 缺点（不合格）：长嘴或者看上去太粗糙；鼻口部过短或者过长。
